messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Videos was Delinquent grandson;  seeds of hschooli
messages.messageBody:
glad2bmadly@... writes:
<<the Columbine news exploded into everyone's world. >>

This was a few years before Columbine, and the song/video is based on a true
story.

> Do they still show music videos somewhere? I thought it was all programs
> now on MTV and VH1. I would love to find a Train video!
>
> Madeline

Late at nite here in Chicago they play MTV 2 on a wierd channel, mostly
videos. Recently, they were playing all the MTV award winners and runner ups of
the past before this year's Music Awards. I've only seen one Train video,
Drops of Jupiter, and it's boring, heheh, they're just playing music on a stage.
That boy is cute tho!

~Aimee


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
